hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: The Prophet (ﷺ) used to wash himself with a sa' (of water) and perform ablution with a mudd (of water). Abu Dawud said: This tradition has also been narrated by Aban on the authority of Qatadah. In this version he said: "I herd safiyyah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُجْزِئُ مِنَ الْمَاءِ فِي الْوُضُوءِ
chapter.eng-name: The Amount Of Water That Is Acceptable For Performing Wudu'
